The stay was excellent.
The room was clean and had a great view. It was exactly as described and shown in the photos. All the promised services, such as transfer, were also included. The host was friendly and responded quickly to messages. This is not my first time staying at the resort, and I can definitely recommend this room.
Thanks for hospitality!

Don't hesitated booking this place you will love it.  We loved the view, balcony, and having a kitchen was great.  Very quiet also, and having a washer and dryer was really nice.  Both pools are amazing, and plenty of sun beds, chairs and bean bags at the pools and beach.  staff is really friendly.  The host is super responsive and helped us with every request.  We would gladly come back.

We were happy to stay at Trangâ€™s place.
Even though we booked her place last minute after returned from Danang International Fireworks Festival late, she accepted our reservation and welcome us in person.
She was such a nice host, gave us a tour and recommendations around the area.
Her place was matched with the photos and description, spacious and cozy, and we felt like home after a tired night at the festival.
We would love to stay more at hers but today we want to stay at the Hoian downtown.
We highly recommend her to everyone.
Thank you Trang.

We really enjoyed our stay! The apartment is cozy, clean, and very well located â€” just a short walk from the center of Hoi An, but still in a quiet and peaceful area. Everything we needed was provided, and the host was very friendly and helpful. It was easy to get around, and we loved being close to the old town, restaurants, and shops. Thank you for a great stay â€” we would happily come back!

I had a great stay here. Lanni always responded to me very quickly with any questions. I could walk anywhere within 10 mins so I loved the location. It had lots of cute cafes and spas around it. The hostel (?) across the street was a bit noisy but only until 8pm so it was manageable. I would recommend this place!

I had a great stay at Lanni's place. The room is cozy and clean and in an ideal location for exploring Hoi An. The area is walkable and very safe and has lots of amazing restaurants nearby. It's not too loud at night and is in a peaceful area. Check in was very easy and the stay was comfortable. I highly recommend!

We had an awesome stay at Lanniâ€™s place - a great base for exploring Hoi An, in a great location. Close to amazing cafes, restaurants, laundromat, and easy to get a grab to the beach! Balcony looking out onto the street was so wonderful in the nice weather. Highly recommend this location - plus there are brand new pickleball courts available to rent just down the street ğŸ‘Ÿ

We loved this place. It actually was very nice and peaceful. The only two complaints I had was that the Projector does not actually work for Netflix as the projector was not updated to a new enough version to run Netflix. As well, the neighborhood gets loud at 6am with traffic, horns, music from cafe, yelling, etc. overall we did enjoy our stay and it was super clean and the host was very kind. Thank you!

I loved staying at Lanniâ€™s homestay. There are three things that I loved about the place:
(1) The room. It is spacious, very clean, the balcony was great, the dutch door is a nice addition, and the bed was comfy. I had the best sleep during my trip at Lanniâ€™s place.
(2) Location. The place was strategically located in the center of Hoi An, just 5-10 mins of walk away from the Old Quarter. The street is considerably quiet. Also, it is exactly above An Hyâ€™s vegetarian restaurant. As a Muslim, this is a life saver :).
(3) Service. Lanniâ€™s was very accommodating, able to provide essentials such as laundry, car rental service, and bike rental. You can even pay for all of those services through Airbnb, so everything is a breeze!
Will recommend Lanniâ€™s place to anyone! (:

Stayed at this lovely house in Da Nang and it was a total winâ€”especially if youâ€™re a foodie! The location is perfect, with tons of amazing restaurants, street food stalls, and little hidden gems all within walking distance. I basically ate my way through the neighborhood.
The house itself was super clean and comfortableâ€”exactly what you want after a long day of exploring (or, in my case, eating). The host was incredibly helpful, always responsive and full of great local tips.
If youâ€™re visiting Da Nang and want a clean, convenient spot with a great vibe and easy access to incredible food, this place is a solid choice. Iâ€™d happily stay here again!

We stayed in 3 places over our 5D4N trip in Da Nang/Hoi An, and Linh's place was by far the best. The room and linens were spotless, the bathroom was beautiful, fancy appliances (kettle, microwave, toaster all in a beautiful retro style). And most importantly, the bicycles were almost new! Compared to the bikes at our 2 other places, these were really good condition and made our adventuring around Da Nang so easy and convenient. There are a lot of good restaurants just up the street. Location is good for nearby places like Con Market, but you will probably need to Grab to the beach. Distance from Son Tra Night market was walkable - we crossed the Dragon Bridge and it was an easy walk back. 100% would recommend for this price.

Lihn's location was pretty central and easy to get to various locations around Da Nang. We only stayed a night, so the single room and bed was more than enough for our stay. Lihn was communicative and spoke to us days in advance of us arriving.

Linhâ€™s place was a great find for us! It was very close to restaurants, spas, and lots of other things to do. The place is easy to find, and the room is very comfortable. Linh was also very friendly and quick to respond to our requests. The only reason that I gave 4 stars was because the construction noise during our stay from 2-6pm that caused us to not be able to rest. Linh had construction at her place, and knowing our luck, her closeby neighbour also had construction. We would appreciate knowing this in advance whatsoever so we could be able to plan better.
The host being very nice and helpful! Everything was provided and especially washing for free x will definitely come back!!!
Great location for your stay in Da Nang. Everything is centrally located and you can just walk yourself to an amazing evening.

Linh's place is a gem! It is 5 minutes walk from the Dragon Bridge and the Cham Museum, with many cafes dotting the neighborhood, making it easy to grab a coffee at almost anytime of the day.
Finding it is easy. With clear step-by-step instructions, checking in is breezy. The place is clean I feel at home from the moment I stepped in. The room and bathroom are spotlessly clean with big bed and high quality mattress and pillows. As the place is not facing a main road, I had uninterrupted sleep throughout my stay.
Linh is very friendly and responsive. I will definitely choose to stay here again during my future visits to Da Nang.

I am so happy with my stay here. This space is so cozy, clean and comfy! I felt very at-home and safe here.
I really like Da Nang and I loved walking around the area. In fact, from this Airbnb, you could take a walk or run across the dragon bridge and around to the Cau Song Han bridge and back and it's about 5km total. Super nice!
So many lovely cafes and restaurants around. My favorite cafe for Vietnamese feeling was Tiá»‡m cÃ  phÃª Cáº­u Ãšt, right across the street. For working, I loved Ge or Wonderlust cafe.
To the beach is only about 10 mins away by Grab bike.
Linh was super responsive and helpful. I would recommend this place to anyone looking for a cozy stay in Da Nang.

Heel moderen en mooi ingericht huis met alles erop en eraan. Host reageerde snel op alles en was enorm behulpzaam. Locatie was ook goed, verschillende zaken op wandelafstand. Beach moet je een scooter huren of grab gebruiken. Ik raad men verblijf hier zeker aan! :) top

Linhâ€™s place is a great find! We stayed for a few nights and found the location to be a perfect spot in town for us! Very close to the dragon bridge, and tons of storefronts and cafes! We are on a long trip around Southeast Asia, so finding a place with a large kitchen and washer/dryer combo was the highlight for us, definitely made us feel at home with all of those conveniences! The rooms are a decent size, with a private bathroom, desk, mini fridge big bed and wardrobe closet in them (and the air con works very well too!). We thought that the rooms were also pretty well spread out too, as we hardly ever heard the other guests when in them. The common space that you share with the other guests is VERY well maintained and has a homey feel to it, there is an outdoor patio on the ground floor along with a rooftop one! The instructions to get into the house are very clear, which was nice since we arrived quite late into the night. Would ABSOLUTELY recommend this spot and plan to return!

This is the nicest apartment I've stayed at in Da Nang. The apartment is on the top floor of a mixed-use building on a main street that makes it easy to go all the restaurants and cafes in Hai Chau. It's also really not that far from the beach side of the river either. If you want to enjoy Da Nang but not have to deal with the craziness and traffic of My An in the high season, this is a really good spot.
The hosts are friendly and very responsive.

The house was wonderful, clean and incredibly lovely.  The pond truly brings zen and you can rest in it for hours!  Nhu was incredibly nice and helpful throughout our entire stay.

We spent 11 nights here and loved it. The room is very large and comfortable. The hosts/staff are friendly and accomodating. The free bikes are great to explore Hoi An on. You can also rent a scooter, which was great. The pool and grounds are beautiful and are kept in very good condition.
I highly recommend this accomodation and will definitely be staying here again next time I am in Hoi An.

We where after a comfy accommodation away from tourist Central but still walkable. This is perfect. Staff friendly, helpful with activities. The breakfast was reasonablely priced and variety and a great recommended restaurant very close and Mini mart.

Absolutely fantastic! Spotlessly clean, great responsive hosts who sorted taxis and trips out for us, great breakfast, beautiful gardens and lovely pool. This was by far our favourite place we stayed in Vietnam! It looks even more beautiful than the pictures and is peaceful and quiet while being walkable from the old town. The hosts are extremely helpful and kind! I could not recommend staying here more!

One of the best Airbnbs I have ever stayed in. The pool area is really beautiful- full of plants and the pool is large enough for a proper swim. Hai and his staff were all incredibly friendly and welcoming, this place is just as beautiful as the photos! Itâ€™s nice and peaceful but also only a 10 min walk to the shops and cafes. We have really enjoyed our stay here. Itâ€™s a lovely home which was very clean with an amazing pool. We would highly recommend anyone to stay and itâ€™s also very close to the old town.

Tony e la sua famiglia ci hanno accolto con molta serenitÃ  e disponibilitÃ . gestiscono un ristorante e offrono  delle stanze dentro la loro casa, proprio davanti al mare. la location Ã¨ fantastica. Very simple, local homestay on the southern part of the main island run by a very friendly and sweet family. Tony, the adult son, is proficient in English, and will be your best contact point. He helped me rent a scooter, which I highly recommend for getting around the island as there isn't a ton within walking distance of the homestay. Plenty of fresh seafood, and the homestay has all the food, water and drinks you need at reasonable prices. Highly recommend the nearby Ray Ong Bang Cafe and Monkey Beach Bar. Room is about as basic as they come, but the air conditioning works very well and the shared bathroom is functional. You can request a key to lock your door when you leave. Great for a super laid back experience living with a local family in a sleepy little fishing village at a very good price. Thank you so much!

Had the most wonderful time. So friendly and welcoming! Mama Hai cooking is amazing!! Will defiantly be back next time we come to Vietnam.
Thank you mama Hai and Papa long for our wonderful time!

This homestay might be the highlight of our whole trip. The homestay is located in the smaller town on the island, which made it feel very local and quiet. The people in this town are amazing loving people, which was also the reason why we ended up enjoying our stay. Mamma Hai and Mamma Nhi (two sisters with their own homestays working together) were such nice people and made us feel like we were at home. Haiâ€™s son, Tony, is the person behind the whole â€œoperationâ€. He is very kind and helpful and quick to respond if you need anything. The homestay also offers different private activities, and I would definitely recommend taking their snorkeling tour, instead of the touristy ones you find in the main harbor. This is a place I will remember for life, and our experience here is very special for us. Thank you to everyone for giving us these memories.

Es war eine auÃŸergewÃ¶hnliche Erfahrung in diesem Homestay, die Gastgeber sind super freundlich und man fÃ¼hlt sich direkt in der Familie aufgenommen :). Very nice, friendly and helpful family. We enjoyed our stay at their place. They drove us there from the port and back.

Pros:
A wonderful family!
Beautiful, peaceful setting.
Tony was wonderful to deal with & very helpful.
Feeding the many very cute little monkeys around the back of the village was the highlight of my trip!
Loved that the beds had mosquito netting, but there were very few when we were there.
Cons:
No hot water for showers! They will heat up some water in a bucket for you to dip into to wash if you wish. There was nothing mentioned about this & we were quite unprepared for that.
As you are supposed to remove your shoes when going inside,
going barefoot into the 1 bathroom (the other has sandals to use) was gross, & the floor was frequently wet. It's best to bring some inside sandals.
Bedroom doors aren't locked from the outside unless you bring your own padlock.

We had a fantastic stay with Hai, Long and Tony. Their spot is right on the beach in a beautiful authentic fishing village. The kids had a ball and enjoyed â€˜mamaâ€™s cookingâ€™. Tony helped us with ferry tickets and scooters to get to the house (no cars on Cham Island). I would recommend leaving your larger bags and hard cases with a hotel on the mainland and only take the essentials.

Beautiful, authentic Vietnamese homestay with amazing hosts in a beautiful remote island. As the reviews and description, the hosts donâ€™t speak much English but this didnâ€™t stop us loving the experience, they were smiley, welcoming and couldnâ€™t do enough for us! Would definitely recommend staying here.

Our host and his family made our Cham Island trip unforgettable. They arranged snorkeling trips, helped us rent a bike, and served delicious food (with generous portions!).
The peaceful retreat by the sea was pure bliss.
In summary, I recommend this place if you are looking for tranquility and authentic island vibes.

We had an amazing stay here! The hosts were so lovely and really accommodating. They made great food and organised an incredible snorkelling trip for us. It is such a peaceful village with wonderful views better than any photo can show.
They booked our ferry tickets for us and picked us up from the harbour on motorbike.
I couldnâ€™t recommend staying here enough!

alles super! Tolle Unterkunft! Strand & Altstadt jeweils in 10 Minuten mit dem Grab/Taxi zu erreichen.

I recently enjoyed staying at this wonderful home again, and I canâ€™t recommend it enough! From the moment I arrived, I was impressed by the beautiful dÃ©cor and the cozy atmosphere. We were flying out of DaNang and Quynhâ€™s place couldnâ€™t have worked out better. So close to the airport (walkable even with luggage). The place was huge and spotlessly clean.

I had an incredible stay at Quynhâ€™s place! The house was spotless, beautifully designed, and had everything I needed for a comfortable stay. The location was perfectâ€”close to the airport, and main attractions in Da Nang.

We stayed at this charming bungalow and had a mixed experience. The host was very responsive and helpful, which truly stood out.
However, several issues affected our comfort.
1. The ground floor toilet's flush tank didnâ€™t work.
2. We were greeted by black ants on arrival. A dead cockroach was found in the bedroom, pointing to the need for pest controlâ€”tropical climate shouldn't be the only excuse.
3. Bedroom AC units cooled slowly, and without a centralized system, the living room became too hot to enjoy.
4. A dressing mirror is missing in the upper bedroom; the small one in the bathroom isn't adequate.
5. Musical instruments add a lovely vibe, but the heat makes it hard to enjoy them for long.
The property has great potential with its spacious layout and creative touches. With better attention to maintenance and cooling, it could easily become one of the more comfortable and enjoyable stays nearest to Airport area. Close proximity to Airport is a big plus. Thankyou ğŸ˜Š

We enjoyed every moment in Da Nang, The apartment was 5 minutes away from the airport and 25 minutes walking to the Dragon bridge.

Perfect experience!
We were picked up at the airport with a name sign and a private driver â€” a very thoughtful touch, especially considering the apartment is close to the airport.
The location is convenient and everything is nearby. Inside, it was incredibly clean with beautiful interior design and quality shower products.
The hosts were extremely attentive and fulfilled all our requests, including extra dishes, drinking water, and even laundry capsules â€” all provided promptly.
Cleaning was flawless â€” truly hotel-level quality.
If youâ€™re looking for comfort and genuine care, this is definitely a place worth coming back to!

It's hard finding a spacious place in Da Nang that actually matches the photos. We had a string of bad experiences on Airbnb with other listings in Da Nang but this one was very good. The host was communicative and fixed issues (both bathroom shower drains did not drain properly over multiple days) when we told them. There is a distinctive sewer smell that comes from the drains at random times during the day and night but this is to be expected in the cities where there is no sewer gas cover. We closed the bathroom doors and it was fine. High reccomend this place if you're working remotely or need some room to space out. The location was far from beach / better areas of town but you can easily rent a scooter or get a Grab cheaply.

Nathan and the team at this hotel are lovely, kind and accommodating, even organising a car to collect me in Danang (a bit cheaper than Grab) and also handy since the hotel is down some very narrow lanes and no turning room (I had 3 grab drivers cancel on me after my checkout as they wouldn't come down the lane).
The pros: very budget friendly price, friendly, accommodating staff who even agreed to my (multiple) date change requests!
cons: room smelled of damp/mould/ likely needs the air conditioner and air vents cleaned out; perhaps a deep clean of upholstery, curtains etc. the shower drain is clogged so the water overflows and likely this doesn't help the mould smell. the air conditioner is right above the bed so is uncomfortably blasting in the face. I slept with my feet at that end, but it's still a bit uncomfortable. the room is very small, so I would only recommend a short stay.
Again, it's great value if you're on a budget, but I would recommend paying more for something bette

â€œExceptional Stay at Da Nang Camellia Home!â€
We had a truly wonderful experience staying at Da Nang Camellia Home! The property is beautifully furnished with three spacious bedrooms, each with its own attached washroom, ensuring plenty of privacy and convenience for our big family. The home was equipped with everything we needed, and the internet connectivity was excellent throughout, which was a big plus for everyone.
What made this stay extra special was the incredible hospitality of the host. They went above and beyond to make us feel welcome, even arranging to pick up our large family upon arrival, which was such a thoughtful gesture. Their care and attention to detail made us feel right at home, and they were always available to assist with any questions or requests.
The location was also ideal â€” peaceful yet close to all the key attractions in Da Nang. We couldnâ€™t have asked for a better experience. 5â­ï¸

We stayed at this 4-story house for nearly a week, and everything exceeded our expectations. The house features 3 bedrooms, 5 beds, 3 bathrooms, 1 restroom, and a beautiful kitchen and dining area that looks even better than the pictures.
The house is cozy and thoughtfully designed in a modern Euro-American style, offering all the necessary amenities you could think of. The attic room, designed for children, has bunk beds and a bit of noise from the water pump, but all the other conveniences made our stay so comfortable that any minor inconvenience was quickly forgotten.
The location is central, making it easy to get around, and itâ€™s near the airport without any noise disturbance from airplanes. Every detail of the house is meticulously decorated, from the dishes and glasses to the flower vasesâ€”itâ€™s as beautiful as a painting.
The host was incredibly supportive and attentive throughout our stay. If I could, I would give her 10 stars! Highly recommended for the family or group.

The friendly lady at the building was always welcoming with a big smile and helpful. The laundry in the fourth floor have everything you require for washing and drying the laundry.
Highly recommend this place if you are looking for a place in Da Nang.

The host was very responsive and replied quickly to all my messages. The place was clean and tidy, and the location was okay â€“ close enough to everything I needed, when you grab a taxi. Overall, a smooth and pleasant stay!

The gym was accessible to all guests, and the beach was just a short walk awayâ€”easy to access and perfect for a sunny day (though we couldnâ€™t enjoy it due to the weather). The resort also featured multiple pools, including a kiddies pool for families with young children.

With only 5-10 minutes drive to Ba Na Hills this is the perfect place to stay when visiting Sunworld or playing golf. The hostess is really friendly, replies quickly, helps with transport and other things you might need or have questions about.

If youâ€™re looking for a peaceful stay a little away from the main Da Nang city but really close to Sun World Bana Hills, look no further.

We really loved our stay in Hienâ€™s place . We didnâ€™t expect the amenities & beach to be this beautiful! We even ended up skipping some of our tours just to relax at the beach & pool. This is a luxury hotel and we felt lucky to book it while still enjoying the same amenities as hotel guests. We stayed for 3 days and 2 nights, but honestly, it felt too short. I wish we had adjusted our itinerary and stayed longer.
Even though I knew the king-size bed might be a bit tight for the 3 of us, I still chose this place because itâ€™s a beachfront at a very affordable price. It would have been nice if there was a sofa bed, though.
There were some minor issues like the room key card not working, getting charged for a towel that got stained & a small hiccups when our Grab dropped us off at the hotel entrance we werenâ€™t informed that our lobby was in the last building. But all of these were outweighed by the overall wonderful experience at Wyndham Resort and I still give it a 5 star ratingâ­ï¸

I stayed at this resort for one night and it was a wonderful experience. The host was very responsive and helpful, which made the stay even more enjoyable. I was warmly welcomed with complimentary coffee â€” although Iâ€™m allergic to caffeine, I truly appreciated the kind gesture.
The room was very new and clean, and the overall atmosphere of the resort was peaceful and private, located right by the beach. One small note is that guests need to bring their own towels when going to the swimming pool, and the washing machine couldnâ€™t dry my clothes â€” or perhaps I didnâ€™t know how to use it properly.
Overall, I really enjoyed my stay and would love to come back again if I have the chance.

We had a truly amazing stay at Coco Villa 3 in Da Nang! The villa was cozy, beautifully decorated, and exceptionally cleanâ€”felt just like home. Every detail was thoughtfully arranged, and the atmosphere was peaceful and welcoming.
A special mention to the villa managerâ€”she was incredibly kind, helpful, and always available, no matter the time. From assisting with small things to going out of her way to make us comfortable, her hospitality was exceptional. She truly made our experience unforgettable.
The location is great, and everything was smooth from check-in to check-out. We were very, very satisfied with everythingâ€”villa, staff, cleanliness, service, and comfort. It was one of the best Airbnb stays weâ€™ve ever had!
If youâ€™re planning a trip to Da Nang, we highly recommend Coco Villa 3. A perfect mix of beauty, comfort, and warm hospitality. We would love to return again soon. Huge thanks to the amazing host!
Host is really nice and house is small but very beautiful and has everything you need.

Great host and staff, peaceful location and spacious room. Easy transportation. Very friendly people!
Wonderful host and staff. Very friendly people. Lovely place, clean and spacious room, very good location. Highly recommended.
Everything said is true. Very nice host, receptionist ans security guard who are friendly. It is clean and 15min away from the old town. I recommend this place a 100% âœ¨

We totally enjoyed our stay with Ky Anh. Our room was very new and clean, full-equipped, from the window looking to quiet and green area, always fulfill of sunshine. Host Ky Anh always comes out to make sure our stay smooth and eager for sharing some local tips for your visit in Hoi An.

Was the perfect place to stay, the hosts communicated with us immediately and were always there to help. They gave us local recommendations and booked us on a tour. The breakfast was incredible as well. All in all a perfect stay would recommend to anybody stopping in Hoi An!

San was a wonderful host from the beginning. She gave me recommendations on local food, places to visit, and suit tailoring. She greeted me every morning for breakfast with a warming smile. The room was on the third floor so you will get your exercise. The view was very good.  It faced the afternoon sun but the air conditioner compensated. Complimentary breakfast was a good deal; did not have to travel for morning coffee or meal. Finally, the cleaning staff was always very friendly even when busy with cleaning rooms. I would definitely stay again.

We had a wonderful stay here! It is away from the busy side of Hoi An yet is in a convenient location with lovely resturants and convenient stores nearby. A 20 minute walk from the old town so very close. The staff were lovely and were always happy to answer our questions and help us out. Breakfast was also very nice with your own choice of dishes as well as a buffet. The room was clean, well kept, spacious and had all the facilities we needed plus a top up of water and cleaning each day. Overall, would love to stay here again and highly recommend!

Looks exactly like the photos. Very clean and comfortable, pool area great and lovely being able to have breakfast on site. I didnâ€™t realise how far from the old historic town it was though - itâ€™s a 25 min walk, and not many exciting restaurants nearby. They do provide bikes if youâ€™re happy to get around that way.

Our stay at Volar Hoi An was excellent! The owner was incredibly friendly and gave us a detailed introduction to possible excursions, recommended tailors, and more. The room was beautiful â€“ tastefully decorated, very clean, and had a spacious balcony. Breakfast was also great. You could choose from a variety of Ã  la carte dishes, and there was also a small buffet with fruit and a few sweet treats. We highly recommend this place!

Volar is a perfect stay in Hoi An. Its walkable to old quaters and has great local restaurants near by. The staff at the front desk are helpful and will give you great recommendations for food and things to do. They'll go out of their way to help you find things or anything else that you might need.

I really enjoyed my stay! The location is super convenient, just a short ride to the old town. The staff were attentive, quick to respond to any questions, and incredibly kind. The only issue I had was the shower drain, which was a bit slow, but aside from that, everything was great. I would definitely recommend this place!

A lovely place to stay in Hoi An. Hosts organised a transfer for us from Da Nang which went smoothly. The hosts were very lovely and friendly throughout the stay and had many local recommendations. Location is quiet and peaceful, a good in-between for both Old Town and An Bang beach. Quick walk to Old Town, and free bicycles to explore everywhere else. Great breakfast with a range of choices. Definitely recommend!

We loved our stay at Volar - it was perfectly located, within easy walking distance of old town, but in a quiet neighbourhood. Within minutes of cycling youâ€™d be out into greenery, and beyond that the beach. The room was spacious, super clean, and had everything we needed. The staff were all very friendly too!

Gorgeous home stay with lots of extra amenities like bicycles that are easy to borrow, my room was very spacious and beautifully decorated and I was glad to have a nice big balcony. The reception staff were very friendly and helpful.
Had such a great stay here at Volar - such a great space, friendly staff and incredible location. Thank you so much for organising our laundry and airport transport too. Highly recommend!

Great place to stay for families and couples. A more private location out of the bustle of old town. Staff was great, breakfast was delicious, and plenty of good eats nearby (Bro Coffee for amazing local coffee with Italian beans, and Tintin for great local food). Would stay again!

Great place to stay, relatively close to all the attractions. Staff were friendly and helpful. Room was comfy and well designed. Only issue we had was that there were ants in the room (despite us not having food) and cleaning. It didn't affect us most of the time, just annoying.

This gem in Hoi An is definitely worth staying at! I loved the convenience of the location (close to many cafes, tailors, and Old Town), the small touches such as breakfast being included and the staff being super friendly, and the quiet and peaceful surroundings. The front desk helped me book a car to the airport at a fair price, and was always there to help me with any services I might need (such as luggage storage). Would highly recommend to anyone wanting a pleasant stay in Hoi An for a reasonable price.
The staff are really approachable and accomodating. The location is close to old town, with ~30k vnd grab car rate. the room is clean and spacious that it will make you feel right at home.

Perfect property in peaceful and calm neighborhood. I booked for only one night but felt like should have stayed for couple of nights more. They helped us to book few local trips as well at a reasonable price. They also provide. complimentary bicycles - perfect mode to explore Hoi An and its beauty.

This villa is very convenient, we can go anywhere in Hoi An within 20 min by bicycle. The staff are very kind, they always talk friendly even though I cannot speak in English fluently. So I enjoyed Hoi An, I strongly recommend it.

We loved every bit of our stay in Hoi An! â¤ï¸ Sam was very helpful and accommodating. We felt like home. Her recommendation for suit tailoring was also great. The place was very serene, charming n walkable to ancient town. We will definitely come back!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Volar, all the staff were so friendly and accommodating. The room was clean and spacious and cleaned everyday. Location was ideal, about 20 minutes walk from old town. Definitely recommend staying here

My partner and I had 3 nights here and it was a lovely stay. About 20 mins walk to the old town but a really nice walk, lots to see and do in Hoi an, we had a great time. Great breakfast daily, staff were super helpful and made us feel very welcome. Good spacious bedroom and bathroom, the only tiny problem was the bed being a bit noisy as you moved but still super comfortable. Thank you!

Had an amazing stay at Volar! The room looks exactly like in the pictures and the staff was very welcoming. A small breakfast was included and bikes are put at your disposition if you want to go for a stroll around the city. Steps away from Hoi An old town but located in a quiet area, I would absolutely stay at Volar again!

We loved our room.  Just like the picture. Great balcony too. Location made it easy to ride bikes to the beach or walk into town. Receptionists were very friendly and helpful. Wonderful time here. Would stay here again. Best airbnb in Vietnam so far.

We absolutely loved our stay here and wish we could have stayed longer! The room was spacious and perfect for what we wanted - the private kitchen was amazing, as was the projector to watch Netflix, and the bathroom was modern and clean. The host was very responsive and very welcoming, helping us to sort out bicycle hire and giving us a great list of recommendations for things to do around Hoi An. Overall, our stay here was very enjoyable, and we would highly recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay in Hoi An!
Very kind human and the property is very clear and worth it, loved staying there
Beautiful room. Spotlessly clean.
Great stay
It was very nice

We had such a great time at Little Pie. The location in Tra Que village is perfect, peaceful and quiet but still easy to get to Hoi Anâ€™s old town. The house itself is gorgeous with beautiful interiors, arts and thoughtful touches everywhere, plus the breakfast was delicious. Really loved how artistic everything was, and the hosts were super friendly and helpful throughout our stay.

Really beautiful and artistic, love the well-designed decoration and the flowers so much. The whole experience was amazing like living in a dream, definitely worth recommending. You can also explore the garden and the pool.
The hosts are really helpful and friendly - I had a large suitcase and they helped me with it all the time.
Breakfast was great as well, tried both western and Vietnamese style, both really nice.
It made my whole trip magical and thank you for sharing this beautiful property with us. I already started missing it!

However, the space was not the cleanest. The towels, pillows and sheet had stains & we encountered several bugs such as termites and roaches in our room.
The location is close to old town but in a very small alley so not the easiest to get to.

This place was a dream to stay in! Wish we could have stayed longerâ€¦ The attention to detail for each placement of object and furniture, the fresh flowers, the family and the beautiful scenery around us just made it perfect. I will HIGHLY recommend you to visit this place at least once in your life and get inspired â£ï¸Thank you for the unforgettable stay :)

Iâ€™m not sure words can come close to how incredible our stay was with Pham at Little Pie - but I will try! The staff were so lovely from the second we arrived, with fruit and orange juice by the pool on our arrival. Breakfast every morning was the best food we had experienced in Vietnam (make sure to try the Cao Lau) with everything grown locally - you could taste the difference and it was absolutely incredible.
Our room was just beautiful, photos donâ€™t even do Little Pie justice as itâ€™s just so special. Make sure you take the time to visit their beautiful cafe located 15 scooter away, the most amazing treats and relaxing area - we loved playing with puppy Chay and kittens everyday.
The location also is a dream, located in Vegetable Village - we couldnâ€™t have asked for a better stay. We canâ€™t wait to come back again and again. Thank you so much to Pham and the team for everything ğŸ¤

Host is friendly and speaks English. Wifi worked ok.  Bed was firm but comfortable.  The doors could be a little tricky but the host said she would improve that.  That was the only negative we could find overall itâ€™s a great 5 star condo.  Walkable to beach and 2 different very nice coffee shops.

My stay here was absolutely fantastic! The space was spotless, cozy, and had everything I needed. What really made the difference was the host â€” super kind, quick to respond, and went out of their way to help whenever I had a question. It made the whole trip feel easy and stress-free. Would definitely stay again!

Excellent place, but even better people. Very good location, very quiet. Everything works well and everything you need is within a 10-15 min walk. Very impressed with the level of customer service and the desire shown to make sure things are perfect for guests. Highly recommended!
I loved the apartment, very cozy and wide, and the neighborhood is really calm. There is even a washing machine. I wished I could stay more, I would definitely come back there :))

It was such a great experience renting this apartment from Linh and her brother Van! We were personally met at arrival and he showed us the apartment and explained everything! There is everything you need in the apartment!
They gave us amazing recommendations about sightseeings, restaurants and bike rental! They were very helpful and kind!
Thank you so much, we are definitely coming back someday!

The apartment is spacious for a one bedroom. The mattress is firm if thatâ€™s what you prefer. Location is just a few streets over from the beach. About 20-25 minute walk to the main DaNang beach. Plenty of local places to eat on the main road. Not quiet, there is a boxing studio downstairs, but it is one of the most quiet places weâ€™ve had in Vietnam. The host communicates very well, even brought me a dessert for international womenâ€™s day.
Very neat and hygienic room. All amenities were provided. Very helpful host. Overall a very good experience
Linh war ein super host. Wir haben es dort geliebt. Er war immer freundlich und hilfsbereit. die Unterkunft ist sauber und bietet viel Platz. wir empfehlen diese Unterkunft.

Very nice apartment for the money spent. Excellent air conditioning.
Location ok.
We are happy for having chosen this apartment.

Great place to stay, has everything you need for a stay.
Host was great, always responsive and very helpful.
Enjoyed my stay at this place and can only recommend it!!!
Great place in Danang, simple but with everything necessary for a comfortable stay. Helpful, friendly and responsive host.
Clean and cozy room away from the busy and noisy Danang. The room is quiet despite local renovations. Lihn is very responsive and proactive. A good value stay overall

A very nice and peaceful spot. As well as spacious.
I had a great two weeks here and slept very well.
Would stay again! :)

We really enjoyed our time in Da Nang at Linh's. The apartment is as described and matches the pictures.  We appreciated having a kitchen with clean dishes and nice appliances like a rice cooker, electric stove and large fridge with a freezer. Also there's a clothes washing machine in the bathroom. Linh was very accommodating, arranged furniture in the apartment before our arrival and helped us rent a motorbike. Location is on the southern end of the city not far either the riverfront or beach. It is a quieter part of town, but there are still plenty of restaurants within walking distance and a 24hr convenience store on the same block. You will be in good hands if you stay here the hosts are incredibly responsive and friendly. Glad we got to stay somewhere so nice for a month!

It was the third apartment we have tried in Baliza Home!
Great apartment! It has everything you need. I liked the kitchen and amenities â€“ even a microwave oven â€“ which is a great plus!
I also liked that the bathroom had a separate place for the shower â€“ so you don't take a shower near the toilet and have water everywhere in the floor.
The bed was huge!
The window doesn't look at the wall.
So, I definitely recommend it!

Linh and Binh were amazing hosts. The house is new and gives off a luxurious feeling. The high ceilings and the wooden floors and ceiling add a very warm and stylish touch. There's also a small but lovely balcony, perfect for enjoying a morning coffee.
Linh and Binh are very attentive and professional. They helped me rent a motorbike and even shared super useful lists of places to visit via WP. I can also say they are kind and respectful people.
The house is located in a developing, quiet, and safe neighborhood. As far as I know, many digital nomads and tourists stay around here. It's not super close to the beach, but I walked there a few times with no problem. Grab rides are quick and convenient anyway. Plus, being in the center of the island means you're equally close to many different spots.
I was really happy with both the place and the hosts. Highly recommended!
Lovely welcome, and they did everything to make sure my stay went smoothly. Area is quiet and I would definitely come back here if I was in Da Nang again

Absolutely loved the place! the host and the co-host made my stay very special, they were super friendly and helpful. the apartment is definitely worth the price. Felt at home right away.  would love to come back. thank you!

Die Kommunikation zwischeneinander war sehr gut und auch gastfreundlich, die Unterkunft ist such wie beschrieben und alles ist schÃ¶n sauber. Wir mussten unsere Koffer wiegen und hab die Gastgeber nach einer Wage gefragt und diese waren sehr freundlich uns eine zu besorgen. Ich empfehle ihnen den Aufenthalt hier.

I have stayed in this host's house many times, the host is always very hospitable, quick to respond, and enthusiastic support. In addition, these houses are always neat and clean. One of the most enthusiastic hosts in Da Nang ğŸ˜Š

Absolutely fantastic stay. All of the hosts are very friendly and welcoming. The apartment was exactly as shown on the photos. They went out of their way to make sure we had a comfortable stay and we loved it very much. 10/10 we will be back to stay again ğŸ™â¤ï¸

The host were very helpful. They went beyond what they need to do as host of the airbnb. We followed their local recommendations and had a great time. They even helped us to order grab delivery, resturant booking in Danang even though they are in Hoi An. The place is very comfortable too! We enjoyed our stay!

Wir hatten einen rundum gelungenen Aufenthalt! Die Unterkunft war genauso, wie in der Beschreibung angegeben, sehr sauber, liebevoll eingerichtet und mit allem ausgestattet, was man fÃ¼r einen angenehmen Aufenthalt braucht.
Die Lage war ideal, ruhig und trotzdem gut angebunden, mit EinkaufsmÃ¶glichkeiten und Restaurants in der NÃ¤he. Besonders angenehm war der reibungslose Check-in und die freundliche Kommunikation mit dem Chloe ğŸ’•ğŸŒ¸ğŸ¥°. Wir haben uns von Anfang an sehr willkommen gefÃ¼hlt.
Wir wÃ¼rden jederzeit wiederkommen und kÃ¶nnen diese Unterkunft mit bestem Gewissen weiterempfehlen. Vielen Dank fÃ¼r die tolle Gastfreundschaft und ein groÃŸes DankeschÃ¶n an das gesamte Team. Ihr seid wirklich klasse ğŸ«¶ğŸ¤©

Our stay here was amazing, it is also a hotel and the staff were incredibly helpful and inviting. We received refreshments on arrival and inclusive breakfast in the morning.
Overall we had the most wonderful stay here and would highly recommend to friends and family!

I absolutely enjoyed my stay in Da Nang thanks to this sweet space! It was clean and conveniently located. I really enjoyed all of the amenitiesâ€” I will definitely come back to stay here again soon!

Beautifully designed hotel. The room is not big but has everything you need. Bathroom is very nice, big bath/shower. The bed is very comfortable. One thing to note is that the balcony for our room opened to the inside of the building, it was not very clear from the photos that this would be the case, so if you want a balcony to smoke on this wouldn't work for that.
The staff are all very friendly, breakfast is excellent with many options that change each day, and they offer free snacks and fruit for you to take with you.
I would definitely stay here again if I came to Da Nang again.

The hotel was really nice and well organized. The staff was really friendly and helpful and the room was clean and as spacious as expected.
The hotel is in a great location, and in 5min you are at the beach. The hotel offers you beach towels and offers to keep your room key while you go swimming at the beach, which is really convenient.
The highest aspect for us was the breakfast, really nice and delicious options. Really recommend this accommodation! :)

Itâ€™s a very nice place to stay. Same as the pictures, but not too spacious as I expected but just enough for 2 people. We enjoyed the bath tub, the toilet is so aesthetically pleasing. We have a small balcony. Air-conditioning is very good as well as the Wifi - good for those who are working. What we love the most was the breakfast!! So delicious and healthy! All staffs are friendly and welcoming, helped us with our luggage. Thereâ€™s an elevator but very narrow. The place is accessible with everything, spas, pharmacy, restaurants and the beach! We will surely come back!
Fantastic stay at mine and my girlfriendâ€™s first time visiting Da Nang. We loved our rooms and enjoyed taking alot of photos inside. Would love to stay again if we come back to Da Nang!
Love the place so much!! Thanks for serving! The staff were really nice and all of them were trying their best to make sure you have a nice stay at their place
Stayed here again. Same comments as last review. Want to say again that the staff are lovely and friendly and that the breakfast is excellent :)
Amazing staff (Alice is very sweet). Location and breakfast are excellent. Beautiful aesthetic and super comfortable bed. Loved the stay, very worth it

Great place with fantastic design and scentsğŸ©·I felt great coming back to the room and get into bed because it was so comfortable and smelt so nicely. The bathtub is my special weakness, it is like out of a dream â˜ï¸ This is a place to relax and have a good time, close to the beach, restaurants abd stores.
Definitely the place to stay in Danang.  The hosts are friendly and very helpful. The place is near the beach and there are a lot of restaurants around. I highly recommend.
The place is beautiful and the staff are so sweet and friendly
Loved this Hotel! Bed was so comfy and it was in a great location.

penginapan ternyaman dan memberi kesan yang sangat baik sepanjang kami berlibur ke Vietnam. lokasinya strategis, butuh beberapa menit saja berjalan kaki menuju pantai. bahkan di sekitar pun terdapat banyak tempat makan, ataupun minimarket. staff sangat ramah, dan membantu. tidak ada kesulitan untuk berkomunikasi dengan mereka. salah satu hal yang membuat kami senang adalah ketika kami dapat memilih wangi apa yang kami suka untuk shampoo, conditioner, sabun mandi, dan sabun cuci tangan. sarapannya pun sangat lezat, kami menikmati makanan khas Vietnam dengan sangat senang. sangat merekomendasikan penginapan ini! saya pun senang dengan keindahan facade bangunan yang tampak indah. suatu keputusan terbaik memilih tempat ini ketika berkunjung ke Danang.
Thanks so much for having us stay awesome place and we loved our room. Would definitely be back!

the best stay so far in our vietnam trip. wonderful staff, great breakfast and quick room service.
would love to stay again

Stayed for six nights and was welcomed with a drink, towel, and a personal soap selection. The staff was both professional and personable, making me feel at home. The room was cozy, and while cleaning could be improved, the outstanding hospitality more than made up for it. Would definitely return!

A really welcoming and well designed hotel in a great location.
The staff are extremely friendly and accommodating. They take great pride in their work and making you feel at home.
The breakfast is amazing every morning and so are the drinks.
Overall a very pleasant stay.

It was a pleasant stay, unlike any other hotel. The unique structure provided a refreshing experience. The staff's service was exceptional, especially Emma, Alice, Ryan, Toan, and Hung Bao. Thank you all!
the interior of this place blew me away. Service and overall place was better than some of the 5 star hotels Iâ€™ve stayed at. Would recommend to anyone looking for a cozy and calming atmosphere
Great place to stay. It has a good location and amazing service!
Der Service war hervorragend. Super freundliches Personal. Das Zimmer war auch gut. Optimal fÃ¼r eine kurze Zeit hier in der Umgebung. Danke vielmals!

As a newbie to Cham Island I think I was lucky to stay here because the host does everything to assist you with anything you might need.  The host's aunt nextdoor cooks wonderful meals and the hospitality is unmatched! The view from the house is nice with a cool temple and some ocean in view as well! The beach is so close! Walk outside and there it is! You should definatly hire a little round boat to take you snorkeling just a short ways to the south! The coral is amazing and you can see why this island is protected! I will stay here again when I return to Cham for another round of island paradise!

Cham Island is one of the most beautiful places on earth. You do not need fancy accommodation to enjoy. Thanks for having us and all your help.
Hope you get around to renovating itâ€™s a little rough diamond ğŸ’•

Un lugar muy tranquilo y familiar en el que pasar unos dÃ­as en contacto con la naturaleza realizando diferentes actividades y desconectando del mundo. Se agradece. Tienes tu intimidad y baÃ±o privado. Hay mucha fauna, ya que se trata de una isla. Puedes comer allÃ­, pero sino tienes otras opciones muy cerca. IncreÃ­ble isla ğŸŒ´
Einfache Unterkunft. In ruhiger Lage mit sehr freundlichen Hosts.. immer wieder gerne

A truly amazing place! I couldnâ€™t recommend it more! Nguyen, auntie and uncle were so so friendly and kind for our whole stay. The location is so so beautiful and the house is authentic and clean. If you go to Hoi An or the Cham islands and donâ€™t come stay here youâ€™re missing out massively!

We had an amazing time the host was so welcoming!! They arranged a motorbike taxi in seconds when we realised we couldnâ€™t fit all our bags our scooter.The location is amazing the town is so beautiful it was the most relaxing place!! Mama cooked dinner for us and it was one of the best meals of the trip. The room was simple but had everything we needed including air conditioning!! And they arranged a snorkelling tour for us on the coral reef. Overall couldnâ€™t recommend this place enough absolutely loved it:))

We was there for three night and we had such lovely time.  Mama & Papa are very nice People and you can feel at home there.  If you need anything, they will help you. You can make a beautiful snorkeling trip. in this accomoditation are everything what you need. Nothing more, but thats enough. I highly recommend !!!!! ğŸ˜

Wow. What an experience. Mama Nhi welcomed us with open arms (literally). The room is humble, but has everything you need. Nguyen helped us organize motorbike transfer. We went snorkeling with another homestay, who are the same family as our hosts. Everyone we met was incredibly kind, happy and generous. Our night on Cham island was very spontaneous, planned only 12 hours in advance and it was one of my top 3 travel experiences of my life time. Thank you!

We had a lovely few days during our stay.  It was so nice to chill in the small village and we enjoyed the community very much. Tu, the host, checked in to see if we were ok and helped with local recommendations. Mamma and Pappa next door were so kind and welcoming. We had lovely food and all we needed for a perfect time. Thank you to your lovely family.

Nice holiday apartment on Cham Island. No frills but great!
A large room with air conditioning and a private bathroom. 50 meters from the sea in a fishing village and away from the masses of Asian tourists who take over the tranquility of the island during the day.
Next to a virgin beach ğŸï¸.
Right next to the apartment the owner's uncles have a homestay where you can eat at good prices.

If you want to enjoy the beauty of island but also want some privacy (which is difficult to have if doing homestay). This house is the one. Itâ€™s a nice beach front studio house 1 big bedroom with 2 queen beds, 1 bathroom. Perfect for couple or family.
Good food is server from Papa and Mama next door and local restaurant nearby.
Beach is nice and beautiful just 50m walk from the house, good coffee shop is 100m.
The village is nice and peaceful. I really enjoyed my stay here and will come back for a longer vacation.

un logement trÃ¨s simple en bord de plage et Ã  2mn des restaurants et cafÃ©
Nguyen Ã  tout organisÃ© pour nous : rÃ©servation du hors-bord, les motos sur l'Ã®le pour nous amener au village, elle nous a tÃ©lÃ©phonÃ© Ã  notre arrivÃ©e pour savoir si tout allait bien.
Son oncle et sa tante sont des gens adorables, on a super bien mangÃ© le midi chez eux.
on a pu faire de la plongÃ©e avec les tubas organisÃ© par son oncle.
Bref, un super sÃ©jour chez l'habitant, trÃ¨s authentique !
un grand merci Ã  Nguyen pour tous les services rendus et sa gentillesse !!

We had such a wonderful 2 nights with mama and papa â˜ºï¸ we were welcomed with hugs and mama cooked for us some lovely local dishes during our stay. Papa took us on a snorkelling trip to a private beach which was a great way to snorkel without coming into contact with all of the tour groups. They helped us to rent sup boards and a motorbike too! They couldnâ€™t have done enough and the overall friendly and family feel was just very warm and welcoming. The location is great- very local vibes but still close to some great beaches! Host was so lovely- they have lots of recommendations and even called to make sure our stay was going well. We will definitely return! Highly recommend for a peaceful visit to Cham island away from all of the tour groups.

It was great to stay at Nguyenâ€™s place
Papa and mama are such welcoming persons, the food and the whole hosting experience were awesome
Thank you!
We wanted to cancel our night but we already checked in, Nguyen was kind enough to accept in give us a full refund :)

Super hospitality and huge portions of food. Mom Nhi was always available for anything we needed. She was cheerful and kind and very generous.
We did not know that the boat would arrive quite far from the home. Be prepared for a very hilly motorbike ride to get from the dock and the main town to the home. Travel light. Location is wonderful. Dad brought us snorkeling via his fishing boat to the most amazing spot. It was beautiful.

Lovely place to stay if you want to experience small fishing village life, you will see people making nets and selling fish in the morning. You can have a beautiful sunrise boat ride with papa for a very affordable price.  Nguyen parents are very welcoming, they met us at the fairy landing stage and made sure that we are comfortable all through the stay..

The place looks freasher on the pictures. A lick of paint and a good dusting will do a lot! This review is purely on the accomodation. The hospitality, food, communication, chill vibe and  pickup where outstanding! Such a cool experiance. The sweer care of nhi and lo (the neighbours) make this so worth its while!

Nguyen place did not correspond to what we found. He has many rooms but only shows the best in the pictures. We thought we were renting a whole apartment and we found a small room in a shared apartment. Anyway, it's great if you want to live a real Vietnamese experience. Nguyen's parents were warm and we had good time with them. Thanks Mama and Papa!

Enjoy island life with the locals on quiet and beautiful Cham Island. The home stay has simple but comfortable rustic style. Thank you Mama and Papa for taking care of us. Cooking, cleaning and fishing or snorkeling tour. Transportation from the ferry was also arranged and hosts will be happy to offer advice. Look forward to coming again.
Be aware there is no ATM on the island so bring cash and the services mentioned do cost extra. Prices are higher than other places in Vietnam... especially for foreigners.

Place is on Cham island, super gorgeous spot. You get a narrow view of the ocean from the porch and practically none of the tourist rush from about 11-2 every day. Few restaurants with super fresh seafood, or mama nhi next door who runs a homestay will cook for you.
We had a fantastic stay at Nguyens place, Mama was extremely hospitable and made our stay really memorable.

It was a very comfortable stay. The host is very kind, helpful and responsive. The studio was new, clean and had everything we needed. Great location, if want to experience local culture. Famous attractions and the beach is a walking distance away from the studio. All in all, I can recommend this place, we had a great time staying here.

Can not recommend enough, also very near the dragon bridge (a must visit, especially the show at 9pm) and the night market.

Their recommendations for Hoi An town were spot-on, thank you so much for a wonderful experience!

Bao was the perfect host! Nothing was too much effort. Amazing breakfast, fully stocked mini bar, which could be refreshed upon request. Private pool was spectacular! Perfect temperature, cleaned each morning. Bao also organised a spa treatment as well as a private transfer back to my apartment in Da Nang. Will definitely come back to stay on my next trip to Hoi An. Many thanks for an amazing break!

Nice place with the necessary amenities. The pool was private and great! Had walkable areas along the river and a nice common area where breakfast is served. Also we were able to rent out a motorbike and go for an evening ride. The host was very helpful and friendly.
Great stay, extremely accommodating and responsive host. Highly recommend any traveller who is looking for a relaxed stay in Hoi An. Pool and room was cleaned regularly and promptly.

Our stay was fantastic and it all comes down to the manager Bao, he is so helpful and accommodating goes far and beyond to help with anything, the afternoon teas he supplies and breakfast are great, I donâ€™t think we paid for a meal in 3 days.
Will definitely be back and would happily recommend this villa if heading to Hoi an.

The villa was immaculate, well kept and was beautiful. The services available for example the airport pickup was so handy. The customer service and breakfast was a highlight of our day. We also left some air pods and Bao organised a drop off to da nang for us for a very cheap price. Thank you so much

My husband and I highly recommend Baoâ€™s beautiful villa.

With our own private pool (which was cleaned daily)

Free bikes are supplied for a quick ride to the beach or into Hoi Anâ€™s ancient town.
Bao is an excellent Host and we will definitely visit again.
Thank you Bao

Amazing place with great attention to detail! Bao offered us so many extra services for 0 additional cost, we had free airport pick up, free ( and delicious) daily breakfast, free airport drop off and free laundry services!
The accomodation itself was so beautiful and peaceful, just like the photos with our own private pool and tub!! very easy and cheap to get to old town and major attractions!
Would happily recommend to anyone visiting Hoi An for a peaceful, cozy and well looked after stay!

Great place to stay. Bao was incredibly helpful with a flexible check in and was very quick to respond to any questions we had.
The place was exactly as described and the rest of the staff were lovely.

Absolutely had a blast here. Bao was great and recommended us so many things to do. Super hospitable and lovely.
Breeze restaurant nearby had amazing local food and the Massage was amazing. Went for massage everyday.
Definitely a 5 star stay

Our stay at palm view villa was fantastic! The room and pool were both very clean, with daily towel change and pool cleaning. A highlight for my partner and I was the free breakfast every morning, with a variety of delicious food and fresh fruit. Bao organised a free airport pick up for us also and gave many recommendations for places to visit and eat. Old town is only a 10 min motorbike ride away, and bikes were provided for free. Highly recommend this stay!

Thank you to Bao and Kim for having us. They were the most wonderful hosts. From the delicious beef pho and tea on arrival to the most delicious and fresh breakfasts. The villas are beautiful and private and we loved the private pool. We were very well looked after and felt right at home. We highly recommend and will definitely come back.

This villa was a dream come true - spacious, peaceful, and beautifully designed. We especially loved the private pool and the sunken indoor hot tub, which made every evening feel like a spa retreat. We felt completely relaxed from the moment we arrived.
The service was outstanding. Each morning started with a generous and delicious complimentary breakfast, and the free laundry service was a thoughtful bonus. Since we stayed 6 nights, we also received free airport pickup and drop-off, which made our arrival and departure completely stress-free.
Bao was an exceptional hostâ€”kind, responsive, and genuinely committed to making our stay perfect. His communication was clear and caring, and we felt truly looked after. We left with full hearts and canâ€™t wait to return!

What a fantastic find Baoâ€™s villa was, we loved having the privacy of our own courtyard and pool, villa has everything we needed for our weeks stay, easy to get to the old town and An Bang beach, Bao was always available to assist with any queries and recommendations, we used several of the restaurants he recommended and they were all very good. A big shout out to all of the staff on site, they always had a smile and were super friendly and helpful. Breakfast was excellent and nothing was too much trouble for them, great extras included free laundry service and airport pick up and drop off. We will definitely return to Palm Villa on our next trip to Vietnam, we would highly recommend Baoâ€™s Villaâ€™s we are sure you will enjoy it as much as we did!
Very welcoming hosts.  Quite hospitable and generous. Villa felt welcoming, safe and was in a nice quiet location. Easy to get a ride into town.

Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefÃ¼hlt, alle Mitarbeiter waren freundlich, Service war TOP , Bao hat immer schnell reagiert & und uns immer geholfen
Wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt gehabt
Vielen Dank
Linh

He arranged anything we needed all with a positive attitude and was super helpful with all questions. Breakfast each morning was fantastic and the staff are very friendly. I felt right at home in Baoâ€™s place and would recommend it to everyone. We will definitely be returning back to his place when we visit Hoi An again in the future. Thanks for an unforgettable experience Bao!

One of the best homestay i've stayed at. Mr.Bao was spot on at every turns, anything you need no matter day or night, just send him a text and you will get it. Check in was quick and easy, he clearly explained every amenities in the room. Too bad we couldn't use the swimming pool cause of the weather, would definitely come back again in the summer though. Host was friendly and accommodative. The house is new, clean and cozy. Short walking distance to beach with many eateries nearby. However, if you were to book grab car or grab bike you have to walk to the main road which is just a short 1 min walk from the house. Highly recommend for anyone visiting Hoi An.

The house was as seen in photos.. very clean, fully equipped, comfortable beds, comfortable seating and the staff who look after the place were very friendly, helpfull and happy to answer any questions.. itâ€™s a lovely house 50 meters from the beachand I would definitely recommend it as a lovely holiday home..ğŸ‘ğŸŒ…ğŸ™

We had the best time ever staying at the Happy Clam! Both the home and the location far exceeded our expectations and we wish we could have stayed longer. We were so close to the beach (beautiful sea and sand, with sun loungers, umbrellas and a drinks service!) and to lots of great restaurants - all within walking distance. Hoi An old town was just fifteen mins in a cab.
Our host was very friendly, flexible and proactive, but we had total privacy for our stay. He also made some local recommendations, which turned out to be some of the best experiences of our whole Asia trip.
I would strongly recommend staying here if you have the chance, and I plan to do so again myself when I have the chance.

Wir hatten einen kurzen Aufenthalt bei Huong, das Apartment war sehr charmant und wirklich sauber!
Alles was man benÃ¶tigt, ist vorhanden.
Sehr tolle und nette Gastgeber die einem sehr hilfsbereit alles erklÃ¤ren und gute Tipps fÃ¼r die umgeben kennen.
Jeder Zeit Zeit wieder!! â™¥ï¸ğŸ™ğŸ½ğŸ˜‡

Vi nÃ¸d virkelig vores ophold. Et af de bedste steder vi har vÃ¦ret hvor det var privat og roligt. Ligger ganske kort til en dejlig strand pÃ¥ varme dage. Boligen var smukt indrettet og der var det vi skulle bruge, selv strand hÃ¥ndklÃ¦der. Der var ogsÃ¥ drikkevand til at tappe i kÃ¸kkenet. TÃ¦t pÃ¥ indkÃ¸b og gode smÃ¥ restauranter, et skÃ¸nt kvarter.
Manager pÃ¥ huset var yderst hjÃ¦lpsom. Vi blev hentet ved bussen og kÃ¸rt til boligen, han sÃ¸rgede for cykel udlejning og kÃ¸rte til Da Nang og kÃ¸bte togbilletter til os.
Vi vil bestemt gerne komme igen og giver stedet vores varmeste anbefaling.

The Happy Clam guest house is a super stay for a couple. There are actually two apartments on the property with a shared entrance, we had the lower level. If youâ€™re a bigger group you can book both apartments.
The decor is very tastefully done and there is a living space as well as separate bedroom, bathroom and kitchen with facilities for self catering. Washing machine also available. Living and bedroom space have ceiling fan and a/c.
Location is just super, on a quiet laneway away from the Main Street, and a 2 min walk to the beach. Also at quieter end of the beach too. Host is very responsive and can book airport taxi and tours, and has all the local spots to eat. If flying in, arrange airport taxi before arriving for easy transfer. Very responsive to messages.
A great stay had.

I think booking this place is so worth it more than any accommodations in Da Nang if you like a quiet place and near by the beach. The place is 50 meters to A Bang beach (so much better than Da Nang beach! And a good place for morning walks/jog and a cold plunge - we came here Feb!) and restaurants, mini mart, coffee shops, open market are all walking distance.
The house was perfect for us! Itâ€™s the little things that matter - they have yoga mat and weights for early morning exercise and stretching before hitting the beach for morning run, wide smart tv if you want to relax at night, the bathroom has a washing machine and a lot of hangers to dry clothes, a working desk with extension cord and a really good wifi (100mbps), a bread knife (!) to cut sourdough bread, cooking utensils are complete!
Linh also is the best host, her restaurant recommendations are always on point - we wanted local taste, not a lot of tourists, and she really gave us good places to eat! Always responsive!!!

Dilhan & Linh are great hosts. Very responsive and ready to help. We even got complementary breakfast on order if requested. We reached quite late and Dilhan helped us get inside without any hassle. Itâ€™s a beautiful house with all the amenities. The rooms were beautiful. Itâ€™s great for a long stay, especially for a large group. The beach is very close and Hoi An town is a 15 min Grab ride. Lot of eating places nearby and convenience stores.

We had a wonderful getaway. Loved the proximity to Ang Bang beach. Loads of restaurants within a short walking distance.
The beds were a highlight - so comfortable.
A wonderful stay

Located just off the main road and a short walk (10 mins max) from An Bang Beach. Lots of amenities close at hand and only 10 mins in a taxi or 45 min speed march to Hue town centre.
Most will probably want to appreciate what both distinct areas have to offer and if you do visit Hoi An old town, have a look for Chickpea Restaurant, as they offer amazing cookery courses.
The accommodation is set up so you can take the whole house or just a room, and still get the same access to the kitchen, living space. Colonial style decor, but befitting of the area.
We loved Hoi An's relaxed vibe.

As someone who travels a lot around Asia, this was awesome quiet beach time and convenience to restaurants. The beach isn't too far, great restaurants and cafes within a short walk.
The bed was great! Big bathroom, connection to Wifi was easy (thanks Dilshan). I'm travel and work from my laptop, this was a must! No hesitation to stay here again next time I visit Hoi An.

Super comfortable stay with cozy beds and linen and lovely Hoi An-style decor that gave the villa a warm local charm.
The beach was just a quick 2 min stroll away, and we loved having so many great cafes and restaurants that were all within a 5-minute walk.
The old town of Hoi An was also just a quick taxi ride away and offered more of the Hoi An charm this area is known and loved for.

I had a wonderful stay. It suited all my needs perfectly. Easy walking distance to An Bang beach and restaurants and yet out of the way so was peaceful and relaxed.
It was nice and quiet at night ( itâ€™s why I like the area). Also just a short grab ride to Hoi An if you want a bit more going on.
Iâ€™ll definitely stay again on my next visit.

I'm a remote worker, I am lucky enough that I get to combine work and holidays.
I couldnâ€™t have asked for a better spot â€” lightning-fast internet, comfy workspaces, everything set up to keep the productivity flowing.
But it wasnâ€™t just about work. A leisurely stroll took me straight to the beach, and I was spoiled for choice with cafÃ©s and restaurants around the place. Perfect rhythm: deep focus by day, chilled evenings with good food and salty air. Bliss! Definitely coming back for more.
Thank you Mia and Dilhan for having me here!
this house was large and spacious and in a great location.  The beds were extremely comfortable too.
Good stay inside the city. everything within 20-30 min distance

Absolutely wonderful stay at the Hoi An Beach Villa! From the moment we arrived, the check-in process was smooth and effortless, setting a relaxed tone for our vacation. The villa's location is just perfectâ€”mere steps away from the serene beach, and surrounded by an exciting array of cafes and bars, offering a taste of the vibrant local scene.
The real highlight, though, has to be the comfort of the accommodation. The beds were incredibly comfortable, ensuring a deeply restful night's sleep after our days spent exploring and enjoying the sun. It's clear that no detail has been overlooked in making sure guests have everything they need to relax and rejuvenate.
Big thanks to the Hoi An Beach Villa team for making our stay so memorable. We can't wait to return!

A wonderful and worthwhile getaway.
The apartment is located on the 4th floor of a quiet serviced area, just a few minutes from the airport and city center. It features two master bedrooms and one smaller room. The main bedroom stands out with its open view and abundant natural light every day.
The surrounding area is peaceful, with plenty of cozy local eateries nearby. The apartment is fully equipped, perfect for family vacations, where you can enjoy going out and still gather for home-cooked meals.
One minor downside: the bathroom has a slight odor, if improved it would be perfect.
The host is hospitable, friendly, and very thoughtful.
Definitely a place worth experiencing!

Khoa is very helpful and kind person. We had a very late check-in but we figured out everything easily because of very informative instructions in advance. When we had any issues or questions, he responded very fast and everything was resolved perfectly. The place is great to experience the local life in Da Nang. On the other hand, if you are not used to traffic noise, it feels too loud because of vivid Da Nang life below in the main street but closing windows and using AC or fans helps. This 2/2 was a great price and accommodated 2 female travelers perfectly. Full kitchen with essentials and plenty hot water for showers. Easy to get anywhere via Grab

Khoa is amazingly responsive. We received great hospitality from him in terms of arranging for new bedsheets, water and detergent for our extended stay. The apartment is very cozy and have everything you need!

Lived at Khoa apartment for 2,5 months, absolutely loved the area and apartment itself. Khoa was helpful all the way through, writes I'm perfect English, so no communication troubles â€“ which is amazing.
The apartment is just as it's in the pictures, maybe a little restoration needed, because of a lot of rains in Da Nang.
Overall, we were absolutely happy to live there and very thankful to Khoa â¤ï¸

Incredibly beautiful house - Iâ€™m fully mesmerised here and so not want to leave in the end. Every corner is designed and decorated with pure love and dedication. Living here definitely makes one appreciate the beauty and romance of life. Not to mention the thoughtful welcome drinks and fruits, and absolutely delicious breakfastâ€¦ The house is in the countryside, so expect bugs and sounds of nature in the surrounding. The tra que vegetable village the house is located in is a gem too. Will 10000% return!

The room was absolutely lovely, and the entire B&B was full of charming French flair. The host was warm and clearly passionate about lifeâ€”the welcome fruit and breakfast they provided were delicious!
That said, due to the natural surroundings, there were quite a few insects in the room (spiders, geckos, etc.), which might be unavoidable given the location. Also, the walls are a bit thin, so we could hear the neighborâ€™s roosters in the morning.
Overall, a unique and cozy stayâ€”just be prepared for a rustic touch!

Charming home, amazing breakfasts! Hosts take great care in making the house cozy. Every detail, from flower arrangements, to choice of furniture, & table ware was so thoughtful. The Airbnb feel like a destination itself.
The breakfast menu had a good selection - local to western food, with a variety of drinks and fruits. It prepped me well for day ahead & I always look forward to it.

Such a lovely house! We enjoy every moment while stay here. The breakfast taste good. Very quiet place near the farm,but few steps walk to get foods, cafe and spa. Also near the beach, we rent the motobike to go to old town. definitely will be back to Hoian for this house:)

I booked this homestay while recovering from surgery, hoping for a supportive environment. Communication was poor from the startâ€”Pham ignored the messesger service WA  and insisted on using Istgm , even for urgent matters. Breakfast was paid for but withheld the first day due to a bizarre ordering system she failed to explain. When I missed it again due to post-op pain, I was scolded as â€œwastefulâ€ rather than checked on. The location was noisyâ€”karaoke and roosters from 3amâ€”and remote, with no mention of this in her listing. Despite agreeing in writing to refund me for unused nights, she later denied it. Airbnb eventually stepped in with a goodwill refund. I was treated rudely, accused of lying, and made to feel unsafe and unwelcome. This is not a warm family homestayâ€”itâ€™s a business focused only on money. I left early and moved to a hotel that was cheaper, more peaceful, and genuinely caring. I would never recommend this stay to anyone, especially those with health needs.

Their was the great place, if need to be rest at quite place, recommend!!
Good breakfast and cutest cat available for healing your holiday :D

breakfast is good . the interior is so beautiful .

Thank you for everything and have a merry Christmas Little Pie!

Amazing accomodation. Perfect location - right by the night market. Construction next door was a bit loud but out of their control. Enjoyed our stay highly recommend. Just like the photos

A fantastic place to stay, perfect location in the old town, just round the corner from the night market but looking out over the river and peaceful and quiet. We were 3 so had the 2 rooms/ apartments on the first floor, one with a big balcony at the front with views over the river, the other smaller but both beautiful, clean and with very comfortable beds and spacious bathrooms. Thanh and Hannie couldnâ€™t have been more helpful and responded very quickly to messages. You do have to time any arrival and departure by taxi to happen outwith markets times but thatâ€™s easy to do and the place is definitely worth it. I would recommend this place 100%.

Had an amazing stay at Thanhâ€™s place. It is located in the Hoi An Ancient Town, right beside a river where you can see small fishing boats. Everything (restaurants and attractions) was within walking distance, which made it convenient for us to come back for afternoon naps. Most importantly, Thanhâ€™s place was very clean (especially the toilet) and comfortable with an amazing river view. Although we were not able to check in early, we were allowed to leave our luggage in the staff room while waiting.
Overall, we had a great stay and would definitely recommend it to others.
Perfect stay, everything was clean and easy to reach. Also right next to the night market which made everything accessible from walkable distance.
super comfortable, very nice apartment nice and close to old town. I would stay here again.
The location is apt for family stay the rooms are well maintained. We wish we had a longer stay to enjoy the home and we will ensure to book again.

This apartment was the perfect place to stay during my trip to Hoi An. Itâ€™s located just steps from the night market and Old Town, making it super easy to explore the city on foot. The design of the studio is minimal yet warm, with beautiful natural touches like wood and clay that made it feel peaceful and unique.
The king-sized bed was incredibly comfortable, and the balcony overlooking the Thu Bon River was such a lovely spot to unwind with tea or a book. The kitchenette had everything I needed to reheat food or make a quick meal, and the bathroom was modern and well-stocked with shampoo, shower gel, and even a hairdryer.
Do note thereâ€™s no elevator, so youâ€™ll need to take the stairs to the second floorâ€”but honestly, the peaceful vibe and thoughtful touches more than make up for it. Iâ€™d definitely stay here again next time Iâ€™m in Hoi An!
Cutest little place with a wonderful balcony with the view on the river. Very good communication. Spacious and clean rooms.
